projects.title: Dev Portfolio
projects.bodyText:
- A responsive, and fully customizable **portfolio** built with **React**.
 -  It features animation-enhanced UI, modular JSON-based content management, dynamic routing, and **dark mode** support.

projects.title: URL Shortener
projects.bodyText:
- Built a **full-stack URL shortener** with **Java, Spring Boot**, and **MySQL**, using **REST APIs**, **Spring Security**, and **Spring Data JPA**.
 - Developed a responsive **React frontend** with **TailwindCSS** and **Material-UI**, integrated Axios and React Router, and containerized with **Docker**.

projects.title: Invisibility Cloak Web App
projects.bodyText:
- Developed an “Invisibility Cloak” Web App that **captures live video**, detects a user-specified color range (HSV) via **automated calibration**, and replaces the cloak area with a pre-stored background in real time. 
 - Optimized real-time video streaming performance by **40%** using **WebP compression** and **binary WebSockets** for **low-latency** video.

projects.title: Movie Search Engine
projects.bodyText:
- Developed a **Flask**-based movie search app integrating the **OMDB API** with a **SQLite** backend, also displaying IMDB’s Top 250 Movies using **Selenium** for real-time updates.
 - Designed a **two-tier search architecture** with database indexing and API fallback, improving search performance and reducing response time.

projects.title: GPT-Based Character-Level Language Model
projects.bodyText:
- Developed a Transformer-based language model in **PyTorch**, implementing **self-attention**, **multi-head attention**, and **positional embeddings** for character-level text generation.
 - Optimized model training using **AdamW optimizer**, **dropout regularization**, and efficient loss estimation, achieving improved convergence and coherent text output.

projects.title: IMDB's Top Movies Viewer
projects.bodyText: - A web app that **scrapes** a list of top movies from IMDB TOP 250 Movies page and displays a list of movies with title, year, and ratings, also allowing users to **search** and **filter** movies based on their title.

projects.title: Real-Time Log Monitoring System
projects.bodyText:
- Designed and implemented a real-time log streaming solution using **Flask** and **Socket.IO**, enabling live updates for **multiple concurrent clients** without page reloads. 
 - Optimized log file handling by developing a custom **tail-like algorithm** to efficiently retrieve the **last 10 lines from large files** (GB scale), avoiding redundant data transmission.

projects.title: Browser Control API (No Automation Frameworks)
projects.bodyText: - A **Flask**-based API to control **Chrome** and **Firefox**. **Open URLs**, **clear cache/history**, and **close the browser**, without using automation tools like Selenium or Puppeteer.

projects.title: Bigram and MLP Models
projects.bodyText:
- **Micrograd** - A pytorch like API.
 - **Bigram** Model.
 - **Multi Layer Perceptron** (MLP) Model.

projects.title: AI Bot - Ultimate Tic-Tac-Toe
projects.bodyText:
- Developed an advanced AI using the **Minimax Algorithm** with **Alpha-Beta Pruning** for optimal decision-making, along with a **Heuristic Evaluation** function to enhance strategic play.
 - Designed **dynamic board management** to handle invalid moves, draws, and open moves efficiently, ensuring engaging Human vs. AI gameplay.
